ðŸ“– Summary: BongoCat is a cross-platform desktop pet application that brings the popular Bongo Cat character to Windows, macOS, and Linux. Inspired by Bongo-Cat-Mver, it allows users to have an interactive cat animation on their desktop, adding a touch of fun and personality to their computing experience. The application is built using TypeScript and Tauri, ensuring compatibility across multiple platforms.
